title: Harden /api/transcribe input validation and upload naming
Validate imported questions and reject empty entries
description: Prevent silent bad data insertion by validating array payload and non-empty question text before DB writes.

title: Prevent duplicate UI event bindings on re-init
description: Ensure retry/load cycles do not register duplicate click handlers that trigger repeated API calls.

title: Integrate external Piper TTS + Whisper STT services
description: Replace in-process whisper with HTTP STT against local whisper-stt (:5002) and add Piper TTS question playback against piper-tts (:5001). Update docs/config and validate end-to-end.
close_reason: Implemented external speech integration, UI playback, and docs updates
